location: The incident occurred at the hilltop Israel Defense Forces positions near Beaufort castle outside of Arnoun.
summary: 04/05/1993: A skirmish opened up between the Israel Defense Forces and its ally, the South Lebanon Army, on one side and Hizballah gunmen on the other. Four Israeli soldiers were lightly wounded in an attack near the Beaufort castle. The attack was initiated by Hizballah, which used 120 mm mortar rounds.
addnotes: Hizballah claimed to have killed several Israeli soldiers. Israel denied this claim.
scite1: David Rudge, "4 IDF Soldiers lightly hurt in security zone clash," The Jerusalem Post, April 5, 1993.
scite2: "Four Israelis Wounded in Clash with Hezbollah," The Associated Press, April 4, 1993.
